## Attempt to parse data dictionary

```{r}
colnames(dictionary) <- c("field", "values")
dictionary$field <- gsub("[0-9]+\\. ", "", dictionary$field)
dictionary$field <- gsub(" ", "", dictionary$field)
dictionary$values <- gsub(" ", "", dictionary$values)
dictionary
```
